ARTICLE.TITLE: Pray For the Peace of Jerusalem(1
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Almighty Father,

Holy, Blessed, and Sanctified

Is Your Most Wonderful Name!

You Alone Are Worthy to Be Praised and Worshiped,

for You Alone are The One True God!





Abba Father!

The e Earth is Yours, and The Fullness Thereof.

It is You, and Only You,

Who Designed it All,

From the Tiniest Quark to the Most Massive Singularity in Space!

This is Your Creation,

Your Artwork,

Your Splendor,

Out Your Infinite Imagination,

That You have Created For Your Glory and Pleasure!

You Are So Awesome!

What can we do Except Exclaim,

"How WONDERFUL YOU ARE!!!"





LORD, We Pray For The Peace of Jerusalem,

According To Your Will and Promise.

We Beseech You on Behalf of Our Captive Brethren,

Christians and Jews,

In Bondage in Hostile lands.





We Pray For Our President,

And other Leaders of Our Beloved USA

May They Receive Wisdom from You

To do the Right Thing.

We Pray For The Swift and Sure Coming of Messiah,

Blessed Be He,

To Establish His Kingdom,

and Make All Things Right.





Blessings To All Who Visit This Garden of Prayer.







Hallelujah and Amen



ML/LTOS
